channel.title: (Help PLZ!) [Delta] Spawn area upon death [Delta] (Help PLZ!)
channel.description:
Hey guys, currently this is my death zone (the place where players spawn when they die):
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/bandicam2011-06-1218-00-20-685.jpg[/img]
How do i change the coords of the death zone so i can make it at my home area (here):
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/bandicam2011-06-1216-05-35-137.jpg[/img]
Someone plz help! ;) [i](my source is 317, Delta)[/i]
